CREATE A DATABASE FOR PET SHOP SCENARIO

CREATING A COLLECTION REGARDING PET INFORMATION

use petShop;
db.createCollection("petDetails");
db.petDetails.insertMany([
{ "petName" : "lucky", "petType" : "dog", "breedType" : "Labrador", "Age" : "15 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Charlie", "petType" : "dog", "breedType" : "Pomerian", "Age" : "20 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Sharmi", "petType" : "dog", "breedType" : "Pug", "Age" : "25 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Meha", "petType" : "parrot", "breedType" : "Golden Macaw", "Age" : "11 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Thangakili", "petType" : "parrot", "breedType" : "Artic Parrot", "Age" : "12 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Putin", "petType" : "parrot", "breedType" : "Russian Parrot", "Age" : "19 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Oliver", "petType" : "Cat", "breedType" : "persian Cat", "Age" : "30 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Prince", "petType" : "Cat", "breedType" : "bengal Cat", "Age" : "25 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Tollig", "petType" : "Cat", "breedType" : "Snip Cat", "Age" : "30 Days" },
{ "petName" : "Sushi", "petType" : "Fish", "breedType" : "Shark", "Age" : "2 Days" },
])

READING ALL PET INFORMATION

use petShop;
db.petDetails.find();


CREATING A COLLECTION REGARDING BUYER INFORMATION

use petShop;
db.createCollection("buyerDetails");
db.buyerDetails.insertMany([
{
"buyerName" : "Shan", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "Labrador", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Madhan", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "Pomerian", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Mohan", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "Pug", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Balaji", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : false, "breedReq" : "Golden Macaw", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Thiru", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : false, "breedReq" : "Artic Parrot", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Sijo", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : false, "breedReq" : "Russian Parrot", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Ranjith", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "persian Cat", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Rajesh", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "bengal Cat", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "Krishnakanth", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : true, "breedReq" : "Snip Cat", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
{ "buyerName" : "KC", "Needed Pet Vaccination" : false, "breedReq" : "Shark", "PhoneNo" : "1234567890" },
])

READING ALL BUYER INFORMATION

use petShop;
db.buyerDetails.find();

READING ALL JOINED INFORMATION REGARDING PETS AND BUYERS

use petShop;
db.buyerDetails.aggregate([
{
$lookup: { from: "petDetails", localField: "breedReq", foreignField: "breedType", as: "Results" }
}
])
